Our ChicagoVPS sale is still going strong for anyone interested, please see below for details:

    **OpenVZ 1GB Special**

    30GB HDD
    1.5TB Bandwidth
    1 x IPv4
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    $21/yr - https://billing.chicagovps.net/link.php?id=43

    80GB HDD
    3TB Bandwidth

    KVM/SolusVM
    Windows Server 2008 and 2012 available!

*Note: You must click the red "Continue" button below "Order Summary" on the right side of the page for the discount to be calculated.

ChicagoVPS has a long history in the Low End Box market serving customers for many years and has been featured a bunch of times, having first been posted on Low End Box on October 16, 2010! We offer service in Chicago, Dallas, Buffalo, and Los Angeles. Backups are available for extra cost.

ChicagoVPS is owned and operated by the same parent company as Low End Box and Low End Talk, ColoCrossing.

In case you want to see the original LEB ad, you can find it @ https://lowendbox.com/blog/chicagovps-exclusive-openvz-windows-offers-limited-quantity/
